channel.title: Making npcs move / stop them from moving?
channel.description:
-- Part 1 --
How can i make it so my npc's don't move? they stay on one spot but if u range/mage them they run after you, how do i stop this?
-- Part 2 -- How do i make npcs walk casually in a range like on rs? Eg. The tzhaar monsters

item.title: Making npcs move / stop them from moving?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

In Autospawn.cfg you’ll notice it says “Range X, range Y” etc, type in your bottom left x coordinate first, then top X coordinate. Then bottom left Y coordinate and top Y coordinate. Its like drawing a square.

Read full topic
item.source: Making npcs move / stop them from moving?
